name: healthcare
description: Healthcare Marketplace for GitHub Copilot and Azure AI Agents - Skills and MCP servers for clinical trials, prior authorization, and FHIR development.

azure-fhir-developer.description: Build FHIR R4 applications with Azure API for FHIR, including coding systems and authentication patterns.

prior-auth-azure.description: Demo skill for prior auth request processing with NPI, ICD-10, and CMS Coverage validation via Azure APIM.

azure-health-data-services.description: DICOM imaging, MedTech device data, and FHIR integration with Azure Health Data Services.

clinical-trial-protocol.description: Generate FDA/NIH-compliant clinical trial protocols using waypoint-based architecture.

cms-coverage.description: Access Medicare LCDs/NCDs coverage policies via Azure APIM

tools.name: cms_search_all
tools.description: Search CMS coverage database for LCDs and NCDs

parameters.search_term: string - Service or procedure to search

tools.name: cms_get_policy
tools.description: Get detailed policy document by ID

npi-registry.description: Access US National Provider Identifier (NPI) Registry via Azure APIM

tools.name: npi_lookup_provider
tools.description: Look up provider by NPI number

tools.name: npi_search
tools.description: Search for providers by name, specialty, or location

icd10-codes.description: Validate and retrieve ICD-10-CM diagnosis codes via Azure APIM

tools.name: icd10_validate
tools.description: Validate one or more ICD-10 codes

parameters.codes: array - List of ICD-10 codes to validate

tools.name: icd10_get_details
tools.description: Get detailed information for a single ICD-10 code

clinical-trials.description: Search and retrieve clinical trial data from ClinicalTrials.gov via Azure APIM

tools.name: trials_search
tools.description: Search for clinical trials by condition, intervention, sponsor, location, status, or phase

tools.name: trials_details
tools.description: Get comprehensive details for a specific trial by NCT ID

fhir-operations.description: FHIR R4 operations via Azure API for FHIR

parameters.resource_type: string - FHIR resource type (Patient, Observation, etc.)

pubmed.description: Search biomedical literature from PubMed/MEDLINE via Azure APIM

tools.name: pubmed_get_abstract
tools.description: Get abstract for a specific PubMed article

authentication.instructions: Authenticate using Azure AD. For VS Code, use the Azure Account extension. For CLI, run 'az login' and then 'az account get-access-token --resource api://healthcare-mcp-gateway'.

installation.skills: Skills are automatically loaded when the marketplace is added.
installation.mcpServers: MCP servers require Azure APIM subscription. Configure endpoints in your MCP client settings.
